name: Night at the MOMA
description:
In this game you'll need to complete Warhol's Campbell's soup piece to restore normality to the art museum. Collect the missing soup cans and return to where they belong.

All sprites and textures were made in MS Paint.  The game demonstrates in a weird way how Warhol's pop art was meant to defy the more expressive and emotional art mainstream art was known for, and instead focused on themes of banality and modernity.

This is more like a demo, since the game didn't finish in time. I'll be adding some interesting enemies, sounds, and more polish in the future.
